events.message: I am filing this claim due to a recent car accident that caused severe damage to the front of my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident given the nature of the reported collision involving the vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to assist with your car accident claim and will be your point of contact through the process.
We have received and acknowledged your vehicle collision claim and we are starting the review process promptly.
Please submit the accident report, photos of the car damage, and your insurance policy to continue processing your claim.
The requested documents including the police report, vehicle photos, and insurance form have been successfully submitted.
We have begun the investigation into the circumstances of your auto accident claim for a thorough evaluation.
The investigation report has been completed confirming the details of the vehicle collision and damage liability.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover repairs and related costs based on the completed investigation findings.
We received your feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and the handling of your claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and we are proceeding with the next steps toward payment issuance.
The approved settlement payment has been disbursed to your account to cover car repair and medical expenses.
Your claim related to the vehicle accident has been officially closed, thank you for your cooperation throughout.
